title: FontLab (OSX) to Windows .ttf and accented characters
content:
I’ve created a face and everything is there, but I simply can’t get the accented characters to show up on Windows. The face is being output simply as a ttf file. Also, I’m using OSX Tiger (English) and the user machine is Windows (French).

Since I’m new to all of this, what should I be looking for to tackle this problem?

Thanks…
author: vaaaska

comments.content:
Are you generating the font in Unicode mode?  
Did you correctly assign Unicode values to the accented characters?

Yeah, they are assigned properly.

I’m not sure what I did exactly but I got them to work - no problems. I output them as Open Type and all went well.

Now, I need to figure out why this works and ttf doesn’t. I guess I should just start reading the manual.

Thanks Mike…
